attributes.action: Spread the cost of water charges in the South West of England to make all water charges, regardless of where you live, equal and fair.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Although the South West of England is enjoyed by thousands of people every year when they choose it for a holiday destination, the residents of the South West are forced to cover the huge burden of cost to maintain the beaches and water quality around the coast, even though their incomes are far less.

rejection.details: A similar petition already exists http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/DevonJustice/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
